posts.post_content:
*"Since when does green pay life?"*   
   
Channel was first printed in *Alpha*, alongside [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond). It seems the original designers thought that exchanging life for access to mana was something that green should be able to do. Obviously, paying life has become black's sort of thing, but it hasn't always remained exclusive to that color.
posts.html:
"Since when does green pay life?"

Channel was first printed in Alpha, alongside Fastbond. It seems the original designers thought that exchanging life for access to mana was something that green should be able to do. Obviously, paying life has become black's sort of thing, but it hasn't always remained exclusive to that color.

Posted By: Endomarru (4/16/2012 12:26:14 AM)

posts.post_content:
Turn 2 win (Because I can't resist):  
Turn 1: Forest, [Helix Pinnacle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helix Pinnacle)  
Turn 2: Forest, Channel, [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice), [Dawnglow Infusion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dawnglow Infusion)x4.  
  
Dawnglow will basically double your life each use. 13x2x2x2x2= around 200. Enjoy double charging your Helix Pinnacle.  
  
Technically turn 3 'cause Helix activates during your upkeep, but still. With an excess of 100 life or so, it's a pretty fun and green way to win.  
  
Can be accelerated by [Elvish Spirit Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Spirit Guide), but I figured that'd be a given.
posts.html:
Turn 2 win (Because I can't resist):
Turn 1: Forest, Helix Pinnacle
Turn 2: Forest, Channel, Mycosynth Lattice, Dawnglow Infusionx4.

Dawnglow will basically double your life each use. 13x2x2x2x2= around 200. Enjoy double charging your Helix Pinnacle.

Technically turn 3 'cause Helix activates during your upkeep, but still. With an excess of 100 life or so, it's a pretty fun and green way to win.

Can be accelerated by Elvish Spirit Guide, but I figured that'd be a given.
